label.string: 1. Global rules are combined together with a logical AND operator, and with the result of the following steps
2. Group-specific rules are combined together with a logical AND operator
3. If user belongs to several groups, the results from step 2 are combined with logical OR operator
Example: GLOBAL_RULE_1 AND GLOBAL_RULE_2 AND ( (GROUP_A_RULE_1 AND GROUP_A_RULE_2) OR (GROUP_B_RULE_1 AND GROUP_B_RULE_2) )
